summary: Multifaceted performer and educator with 15+ years of professional dance experience, leadership in cultural organizations, and teaching across dance styles (Bollywood, Bharathanatyam, Fusion). Experienced in event planning, fundraising, volunteer coordination, and community outreach, with healthcare exposure and CPR certification.

experience.title: Lead/Post-Graduate Company Dancer
experience.description: Graduated with a solo dance debut; performed in 15+ large-scale productions; led choreography and aesthetics as a senior dancer; performed at schools, temples, and events; collaborated with world-renowned dancers; received Rangoli Artistic Merit Award in 2016.

experience.title: Vice President of Youth Committee and Volunteer
experience.company: Karnataka Cultural Association of Southern California
experience.description: Volunteered at religious, community, and fundraising events; emceed shows such as Children's Day, Drama Festival, and Indian New Year; organized 10+ fundraisers; participated in performances; Community Service Award in 2016.

experience.title: Vice President of Volunteer Group
experience.description: Assisted in care of the elderly (dietary and medical needs); organized events and activities; delivered presentations on elderly care, basic science, people skills, and common diseases.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Taught children with Autism music, dance, and art; studied medical needs; built relationships with parents to offer support and provide personal downtime.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Assisted with teaching classes in Bollywood, Bharathanatyam, Fusion; choreographed pieces for performances and private classes; performed at events and fundraising.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Worked alongside nurses in acute care; learned vital signs; assisted in central service, dietary, physical therapy, pediatrics, and urology; studied body mechanics, biology, chemistry; completed CPR certification.
